1{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
3{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
4
5-- | Type-specific operators.
6
7module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Peripheral
8  ( ropsPeripheral,
9    -- * RDF
10    consRdf,
11    -- * tie
12    consTie, relmapTie, relkitTie,
13    -- * untie
14    consUntie, relmapUntie, relkitUntie,
15    -- * term-name
16    consTermName, relmapTermName, relkitTermName,
17    -- * time
18    consToday, consNow,
19    -- * add term
20    consAdd1, relmapAdd1, relkitAdd1,
21  ) where
22
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus           as K
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core               as C
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base           as Rop
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Term      as Rop
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Message   as Msg
28
29-- | Implementation of relational operators.
30ropsPeripheral :: (K.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
31ropsPeripheral = Rop.rops "peripheral"
32    [ consNow       K.& [ "now /N"                K.& "local : -term"
33                        , "now /N -utc"           K.& "utc : -term . -utc"
34                        , "now /N -zoned"         K.& "zoned : -term . -zoned" ]
35    , consRdf       K.& [ "rdf P /S /O"           K.& "-pattern -term*" ]
36    , consTermName  K.& [ "term-name /N"          K.& "-term" ]
37    , consTie       K.& [ "tie /P ... -to N"      K.& "-term* . -to" ]
38    , consToday     K.& [ "today /N"              K.& "-term" ]
39    , consUntie     K.& [ "untie /P -only /P ..." K.& "-from . -only" ]
40    ]
41
42-- ----------------------  RDF
43
44-- | __rdf P \/S \/O__
45consRdf :: C.RopCons c
46consRdf med =
47    do sign  <- Rop.getWord  med "-pattern"
48       [s,o] <- Rop.getTerms med "-term"
49       Right $ C.relmapSource med sign ["/s", "/o"] K.++
50               Rop.relmapRename med [(s,"/s"), (o,"/o")]
51
52
53
54-- ----------------------  tie
55
56-- | __tie \/P ... -to \/N__
57consTie :: (K.CTie c) => C.RopCons c
58consTie med =
59  do ns <- Rop.getTerms med "-term"
60     to <- Rop.getTerm  med "-to"
61     Right $ relmapTie med (ns, to)
62
63-- | Create @tie@ relmap.
64relmapTie :: (K.CTie c) => C.Intmed c -> ([K.TermName], K.TermName) -> C.Relmap c
65relmapTie med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitTie
66
67-- | Create @tie@ relkit.
68relkitTie :: (K.CTie c) => ([K.TermName], K.TermName) -> C.RelkitFlow c
69relkitTie _ Nothing = C.relkitUnfixed
70relkitTie (ns, to) (Just he1) = Right kit where
71    pick      = K.pickDirect ns he1
72    he2       = K.headCons to he1
73    kit       = C.relkitLine False he2 flow
74    flow cs1  = let tie = K.pTie $ zip ns $ pick cs1
75                in tie : cs1
76
77
78-- ----------------------  untie
79
80-- | __untie \/P -to \/N ...__
81consUntie :: (K.CTie c) => C.RopCons c
82consUntie med =
83  do from <- Rop.getTerm  med "-from"
84     ns   <- Rop.getTerms med "-only"
85     Right $ relmapUntie med (from, ns)
86
87-- | Create @untie@ relmap.
88relmapUntie :: (K.CTie c) => C.Intmed c -> (K.TermName, [K.TermName]) -> C.Relmap c
89relmapUntie med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitUntie
90
91-- | Create @untie@ relkit.
92relkitUntie :: (K.CTie c) => (K.TermName, [K.TermName]) -> C.RelkitFlow c
93relkitUntie _ Nothing = C.relkitUnfixed
94relkitUntie (from, ns) (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
95    pick      = K.pickDirect [from] he1
96    he2       = K.headAppend ns he1
97    kit2      = C.relkitLineAb False he2 flow
98    flow cs1  = do let [tie] = pick cs1
99                   cs <- tiePick ns $ K.gTie tie
100                   Right $ cs ++ cs1
101
102tiePick :: [K.TermName] -> [K.Term c] -> K.Ab [c]
103tiePick ns tie = mapM pick ns where
104    pick n = case lookup n tie of
105               Just c   ->  Right c
106               Nothing  ->  Msg.adlib "no term"
107
108
109-- ----------------------  term-name
110
111-- | __term-name \/N__
112consTermName :: (K.CTerm c) => C.RopCons c
113consTermName med =
114  do n <- Rop.getTerm med "-term"
115     Right $ relmapTermName med n
116
117-- | Create @term-name@ relmap.
118relmapTermName :: (K.CTerm c) => C.Intmed c -> K.TermName -> C.Relmap c
119relmapTermName med n = C.relmapFlow med $ relkitTermName n
120
121-- | Create @term-name@ relkit.
122relkitTermName :: (K.CTerm c) => K.TermName -> C.RelkitFlow c
123relkitTermName n Nothing    = Msg.noAttr $ K.termNameString n
124relkitTermName n (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
125    he2       = K.headFrom [n]
126    kit2      = C.relkitWhole False he2 flow
127    flow _    = map term $ K.getTermNames he1
128    term t    = [K.pTerm t]
129
130
131-- ----------------------  today & now
132
133-- | __today \/N__
134--
135--   Get today's time at term \/N.
136--
137consToday :: (K.CTime c) => C.RopCons c
138consToday med =
139  do n <- Rop.getTerm med "-term"
140     let t = C.globalTime $ C.ropGlobal med
141     consAdd1 (n, K.pTime $ K.timeCutClock t) med
142
143-- | [now \/N] Get current local time without time zone at term \/N.
144--   [now \/N -zoned] Get current local time with time zone at term \/N.
145--   [now \/N -utc] Get current UTC.
146--
147consNow :: (K.CTime c) => C.RopCons c
148consNow med =
149  do n <- Rop.getTerm med "-term"
150     let tim    = C.globalTime $ C.ropGlobal med
151         tag    = (`elem` Rop.getTags med)
152         cons f = consAdd1 (n, K.pTime $ f tim) med
153     case () of
154       _ | tag "local"  -> cons K.timeLocalize
155         | tag "zoned"  -> cons id
156         | tag "utc"    -> cons $ K.timeAltZone $ const 0
157         | otherwise    -> Msg.adlib "unknown tag"
158
159
160-- ----------------------  Add term
161
162-- | Add single constant term to each tuples.
163consAdd1 :: K.Term c -> C.RopCons c
164consAdd1 term med = Right $ relmapAdd1 term med
165
166-- | Create term-adding relmap.
167relmapAdd1 :: K.Term c -> C.Intmed c -> C.Relmap c
168relmapAdd1 term med = C.relmapFlow med $ relkitAdd1 term
169
170-- | Create term-adding relkit.
171relkitAdd1 :: K.Term c -> Maybe K.Head -> K.Ab (C.Relkit c)
172relkitAdd1 _ Nothing = C.relkitUnfixed
173relkitAdd1 (n, c) (Just he1) = Right kit where
174    he2   = K.headCons n he1
175    kit   = C.relkitLine False he2 (c :)
176
